Orbital Mechanics: Toolbox

Bill has a bag of tricks but which are feasible. Can these tricks be rated accordingly?

That is if the data is easy to observe and the tool not complicated then it is very feasible.

Ratings are: 

1. Very Feasible
2. Feasible
3. Complicated
4. Almost Not Feasible
5. No way Bill

Keep in mind Bill is the observer/operator and the tools are relatively small. He brings the tools along or are installed on the vessel. Some tools build upon each other and allow for further information processing.

Some information is found in the stock game but only from certain view screens. Such as the altimeter in IVA mode.

Currently my choice in career is to turn off all readouts until upgrading the Tracking and Mission Control. Now re-thinking that decision and will include the stock readouts after acquiring the first two technologies and pay for Bill's calculator and the minor upgrades. The cost for the minor upgrades is estimated to be half the total cost of the Tracking and Mission Control. 

 The team will celebrate and the budget for the party is exactly the same as the cost for the minor upgrades. The party includes the displaying of some err.. ehhm...fireworks.
